entries.journal_entry_description: A droid working for someone named Pann has hired you to help in the search of what the droid called a 'Codex'.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Q4P3 provided you with coordinates to where the connection with the mining droid was lost.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Scout the area and try to find the mining droid. If you find it, plug the scanner that Q4P3 gave you in to it.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: How does this thing work again? There, can you hear me now? Good. This looks very promising. Please proceed to the coordinates that I'm uploading to your datapad, as soon as you are able to. Thank you! Q4P3 over and out.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The mining droid had some information that got Q4P3 really excited. He has provided you with the coordinates from the mining droid, head over there and see what you can find.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: There's some nearby ruins. Search them and see what you can find.
entries.task05_message_box_text: You dig through the rubble with your hands and spot what you guess could be the Codex, from Q4P3's description. As you grab it, you hear something behind you...
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: A woman charges out from her hiding spot heading in your direction. She's obviously hostile.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Return to Q4P3 with the little pyramid shaped item
entries.task14_message_box_text: While searching the rubble, you get an uneasy feeling that someone is watching you but can't see anyone. You finish going through the rubble but find nothing of interest. Keep looking around the area.
